text: Calliotropis siphaios is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Eucyclidae. ==Description== The shell reaches a height of 5.2 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Pacific Ocean off Fiji and Tonga. ==References== * Vilvens C. (2007) New records and new species of Calliotropis from Indo-Pacific. Novapex 8 (Hors Série 5): 1–72. ==External links== * siphaios Category:Gastropods described in 2007
title: Calliotropis siphaios
